metadata.title: CVE-2023-45897 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
exfatprogs before 1.2.2 allows out-of-bounds memory access, such as inread_file_dentry_set.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-45897` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exfatprogs - 1.1.3-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exfatprogs package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.3-1ubuntu0.1').
